ch0296_40_nanjamo/0101_0701_02_10:
You never know what might happen tonight—
gotta be prepared for anything!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7101_0701_01_10:
I heard some rumors about ghosts, so I decided to
do a special on paranormal stuff!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7101_0701_02_10:
But if nothin’ interesting happens...my footage’ll be
totally scuffed!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7101_0701_03_10:
So, uh, just a heads up—if things start to get a
little dull, I’mma need you to, y’know...give it a
li’l jolt!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7102_0701_01_10:
I’ve been hearin’ a lotta people around town
shoutin’ “Fight or Fright!”
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7102_0701_02_10:
If it were up to me, I’d make ’em shout “Buzz or
Battle!” instead!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7102_0701_03_10:
If you don’t help me go viral, we gotta battle!
Wooo!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7103_0701_01_10:
I gotta think hard about when to make the
announcement video for my new Pokémon
partner...
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7103_0701_02_10:
But the thing is, there’s still a lot of mystery
surrounding Flutter Mane...
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7103_0701_03_10:
and it wouldn’t do any good if I started spreading
false info.
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7104_0701_01_10: I dunno too much about paranormal stuff...
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7104_0701_02_10:
It’d be nice if I could get a subject-matter expert
to help me out...
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7104_0701_03_10:
Huh? No way! You know an occult specialist here
on Pasio?!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7105_0701_01_10:
To get folks interested in your videos, it’s real
important to make things SOUND super interesting!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7105_0701_02_10:
“Someone crept up behind a completely
unsuspecting [Name:PlayerNickname ],
and the moment [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] turned around...”
ch0296_40_nanjamo/7105_0701_03_10:
See? Betcha can’t wait to hear what happened
next, right?
ch0296_40_nanjamo/1701_0701_01_10:
Here’s a present for you! Thanks for all the great
ideas you’ve given me!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/1701_0702_01_10:
Don’t forget to name-drop me when you talk
about that present on your socials, and—
ch0296_40_nanjamo/1701_0702_02_10: Er, I mean, take good care of it!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/2501_0701_01_10:
Showin’ off a new outfit is a big event for a
streamer like me, you know!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/2501_0701_02_10:
Those kinda reveals bring in loads of attention!
My view count is gonna rise like an Eelektross
crawlin’ out of the ocean! Nyahahaaa!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve heard Pasio’s got a bunch of super-duper
fashion designers!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/2501_0702_02_10:
I want you to help me brainstorm ideas for outfits
I should wear!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/2511_0701_01_10:
I don’t want everyone to think that all I care about
is doing live streams...
ch0296_40_nanjamo/2511_0701_02_10: So I’m makin’ sure my battling’s top-notch, too!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/2511_0701_03_10:
I’m always up or down for a battle! If you ever
wanna see me go all out, just say the word!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/2511_0702_01_10:
But if I beat you, I’ve got a LONG list of stuff for
you to do!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/2511_0702_02_10:
Heheheheh! I can already tell that our next collab
is gonna do HUGE numbers!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/3001_0701_01_10:
*yawn* So sleepy... I was up way late streaming
last night...
ch0296_40_nanjamo/3003_0701_01_10:
Nighttime is when the party REALLY starts! Hope
you’re all gettin’ ready, my loyal fanbytes!
ch0296_40_nanjamo/3005_0701_01_10:
Let’s get this nighttime party started! I bet
somethin’ll happen that goes super viral!
